space.serialization

Class ModelToJson

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.serialization.ModelToJson
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorldSaver

    public class ModelToJson
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorldSaver
    a class that is used to save the model to a Json file that can be loaded back in the game at a later stage used to store the game data of the current player - and the state of the world that the current player was in Written like a parser - Recursive Descent
    Author:
    Shweta Barapatre (300287438)
